text: an icy melon milk granita is the perfect
treat for a hot summer day and it's
super quick to put together all you need
is some lime juice or you could use
lemon juice this is a quarter cup right
into a blender or food processor third
of a cup of sweetened condensed milk
this is what gives it that milky
sweetness right into the blender and
then six cups of cubed melon now you
could use honeydew or watermelon I have
cantaloupe today which is my favorite
and it goes it doesn't all fit we can do
it in batches so that's number one here
we go and turn it on this is all there
is to it okay that looks totally pureed
so this is going into an 8-inch square
pan and the whole mix is gonna freeze
for about eight hours and then we're
gonna scrape it into the gritty back
perfect into the freezer cup okay our
granita is frozen you can also do this a
couple days ahead and just leave it like
this you want to scrape it right before
you're ready to eat it so just a regular
fork and scrape and this is what forms
all those wonderful ice crystals and
that's exactly what you want
kind of like an Italian ice but I love
that this has the sweetened condensed
milk because it gives it that creamy
milky taste to it
once you've scraped enough you can just
scoop into bowls I like to keep it loose
don't use an ice cream scooper just use
a spoon because you want to see all
those beautiful crystals and really I
like to scrape just as much as I'm gonna
use if I'm going to just serve two
people I would only scrape this amount
and I put it back in the freezer and
scrape when I wanted more there it is
our melon milk granita
favourited try
hmm so cooling and refreshing your
guests will love it and you can make up

different wonderful flavors to share
